description: Fiscal Data Package is a simple specification for data access and delivery of fiscal data.
title: Fiscal Data Package

___fiscalPeriod.description: The fiscal period of the dataset
___fiscalPeriod.title: Fiscal period for the budget

$eref.description: The license under which this package is published.
$eref.title: License

$eref.description: A base URI or path for resource paths in this package.
$eref.title: Base

$eref.description: Additional Data Packages required to install this package.
$eref.title: Data Dependencies

$eref.description: A human-readable title.
$eref.title: Title

$eref.description: A image to represent this package.
$eref.title: Image

$eref.title: Contributors

$eref.title: Sources

$eref.description: A valid 2-digit ISO country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2), or, an array of valid ISO codes.
$eref.title: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 Country code

___mapping.description: The mapping hash provides a way to link the 'physical' model - the data in CSV files - to a more general, conceptual, 'logical' model for fiscal information.
___mapping.title: Mapping

___primaryKey.description: Either an array of strings corresponding to the name attributes in a set of field objects in the fields array or a single string corresponding to one of these names. The value of primaryKey indicates the primary key or primary keys for the dimension.
___primaryKey.title: Primary Key

___attributes.description: Attribute objects that make up the dimension
___attributes.title: Attributes

___dimensionType.description: Describes what kind of a dimension it is.
___dimensionType.title: Dimension Type

___dimensions.description: Dimensions are groups of related fields. Dimensions cover all items other than the measure.
___dimensions.title: Dimensions

___phase.description: A keyword that represents the phase of the data, can be proposed for a budget proposal, approved for an approved budget, adjusted for modified budget or executed for the enacted budget
___phase.title: Budget phase

___direction.description: A keyword that represents the direction of the spend, either expenditure or revenue.
___direction.title: Direction of the spending

___measures.description: Measures are numerical and correspond to financial amounts in the source data.
___measures.title: Measures

___granularity.title: Granularity of resources
